Reference

Package overview

Overview of the completejourney package

completejourney-package completejourney

completejourney package

Datasets

A complete list of package datasets

campaigns

Campaigns to household data.

campaign_descriptions

Campaign metadata.

coupons

Coupon metadata.

coupon_redemptions

Coupon redemption data.

demographics

Household demographic metadata.

products

Product metadata.

promotions_sample

Sampling of the full promotions data set.

transactions_sample

Sampling of the full Complete Journey transactions.

Data importing

Download full promotions and transactions data sets

get_promotions()

Get full Complete Journey promotions data set.

get_transactions()

Get full Complete Journey transactions data set.

get_data()

Download full promotions and transactions data simultaneously.

Utilities

Utility functions and operators

`%<-%`

Assign values to names
